sentences.sContent: Mail-order catalogs are a convenient way to shop.
sentences.sCn: 使用邮购目录是一种方便的购物方式。

sentences.sContent: My secretary will call you to arrange a convenient time to meet.
sentences.sCn: 我的秘书会打电话给你安排一个方便的时间见面。

remMethod.val: “肯为你的” → 肯为你着想的 → 方便的

trans.tranOther: useful to you because it saves you time, or does not spoil your plans or cause you problems
